title: Login Issue
description: User is unable to log in despite entering the correct username and password. System does not show any error message, making it unclear why the login fails.

title: Payment Failed
description: Transactions initiated by the user are not completing successfully. Payment gateway returns errors intermittently, preventing users from purchasing products.

title: Account Locked
description: User account has been locked automatically after multiple failed login attempts. User cannot access account and needs a way to recover or unlock it.

title: Forgot Password
description: Password reset functionality is not working. The reset link sent via email either does not open or does not allow the user to create a new password.

title: Error 404 on Dashboard
description: After logging in, the user is redirected to a dashboard page that shows a 404 error, indicating the page cannot be found. This blocks access to important user data.

title: Refund Request
description: Customer received the wrong product and is requesting a refund. The system needs to handle refund requests efficiently while keeping proper records.

title: App Crash
description: The mobile application crashes immediately when the user tries to open their profile page. This prevents users from accessing personal settings and information.

title: Unable to Upload File
description: File upload functionality fails with an unknown error message. Users cannot upload documents, images, or other files, which is critical for workflow.

title: Notification Not Received
description: Users are not receiving email notifications for account activity or system updates. This affects timely communication and user engagement.

title: Slow Loading
description: Website performance is significantly slow on Safari browser. Pages take a long time to load, affecting user experience and retention.

title: Incorrect Invoice
description: Invoices generated by the system show incorrect total amounts. Users are billed incorrectly, which can lead to disputes and requires urgent correction.

title: Broken Link
description: The 'Terms & Conditions' link on the website is broken and does not redirect users to the intended page, causing confusion and affecting compliance.

title: Profile Picture Not Updating
description: Users are unable to update their profile pictures. Uploading new images fails, and the previous picture remains unchanged, affecting personalization.

title: Subscription Issue
description: Users are being charged twice for the monthly subscription. This issue needs immediate attention to avoid billing errors and customer dissatisfaction.

title: Chat Not Working
description: The live chat feature on the support page is unresponsive. Users cannot communicate with support agents, resulting in unresolved queries and poor support experience.
